Introduction
This topic contains information on the effect of reductions or terminations of SC disability on the receipt of Chapter 31 benefits, including
effects of a reduction or severance on Chapter 31 benefits
, and
preventing an overpayment
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Rating Decisions for Reduction Due to Improvement
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A
